content.body: snek: As far as I know this (and where you might put the cursor as you arrowkey through a ligature) is not defined. And from what I recall Firefox may be the only engine that tries to do something in this case
content.formatted_body: snek: As far as I know this (and where you might put the cursor as you arrowkey through a ligature) is not defined. And from what I recall Firefox may be the only engine that tries to do something in this case

content.body: Exactly what you're even *capable* of doing is dependent entirely on your font rendering engine, so we just don't say anything.
content.formatted_body: Exactly what you're even capable of doing is dependent entirely on your font rendering engine, so we just don't say anything.
